title: Hall of Beorn Card Search now includes Ian's First Age custom scenario

comments.content:
http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Search?CardSet=First+Age [http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Search?CardSet=First+Age]

Scenarios can be found here:

http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/Hunting-of-the-Wolf [http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/Hunting-of-the-Wolf]
http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/The-Isle-of-Werewolves [http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/The-Isle-of-Werewolves]
http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/The-Seat-of-Morgoth [http://hallofbeorn.com/Cards/Scenarios/The-Seat-of-Morgoth]

For those who haven't already done so, you can get all of the details of Ian's epic First Age quests:

http://talesfromthecards.wordpress.com/first-age/ [http://talesfromthecards.wordpress.com/first-age/]
 

 

For anyone worrying that custom cards will now be returned in search results - don't. Unless you specifically filter for it (e.g. Set = First Age or Sphere = Mastery), or check the "Custom" box, custom cards will not be returned in the search results. Only official cards are returned by default.

Enjoy!

>  
> 
> For anyone worrying that custom cards will now be returned in search results - don't. Unless you specifically filter for it (e.g. Set = First Age or Sphere = Mastery), or check the "Custom" box, custom cards will not be returned in the search results. Only official cards are returned by default.
> 
> Enjoy!

 

Feature I'm most happy about.
Great news! I have started to play the quests and it is really worth getting a set printed. Cant wait for expansions to come out for it!
